title: Bellator 230/Bellator Europe 5: Manhoef-Bahati, Carvalho-Nemkov, more
text:
We want your predictions for Friday’s Bellator 230 and Bellator Europe 5 events in Milan, Italy.

Our staff picks feature includes the consensus picks from MMA Junkie readers. Simply cast your vote for each bout below, and we’ll use the official tallies that are registered by Thursday at noon ET (9 a.m. PT).

Those MMA Junkie reader consensus picks will be part of the Bellator 230 and Bellator Europe 5 event staff predictions we release Friday ahead of the event. Bellator Europe 5 and Bellator 230 take place Saturday at Allianz Cloud in Milan, Italy. The Bellator Europe 5 card streams on MMA Junkie. The Bellator 230 main card streams on DAZN via tape delay.

Make your picks for all eight fights inside:
description: We want your predictions for Saturday's Bellator 230 and Bellator Europe 5 events in Milan, Italy.
